EmailTemplate.name: Quote Create Portal Email Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell RFQ Acknowledgement {Reference Quote#: {!Case.CaseNumber}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Portal_Contact_Email__c},
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support. Your quote tracking number for this inquiry is provided in the email subject line. If you reply to this e-mail, please leave the Reference Quote# within the subject line for quicker responses. If you wish to communicate with us further about this inquiry or place an order on this quote:
To login or create a Honeywell ID Account and get RFQ Status, click the below link: https://commerce.honeywell.com/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/eViewRFQ?storeId=10651
Or, reply to this e-mail with your PO attached -- If you reply to this e-mail, please leave the Reference Case # within the subject line for quicker responses.
Thank you, we appreciate your business!
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com
Due to government regulations and/or contractual limitations, all data and/or attachments containing export control information and/or containing details related to Space, Munitions and Missiles items is not authorized for entry or use in our applications or systems at the present time
